string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Through the Road to Oblivion4
I received permission to go all the way to #m270030400#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270030400##k and defeat #r999 #o8200012##k. \n\n#o8200012# #r#a35181##k
I defeated 999 #o8200012#. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows me to go up to #m270030500#.
If you want to go further, you'll need to take a harder test, same as before. So what do you want? Do you want the new test?
Then go to #b#m270030400##k and defeat the #r#o8200012##k. If you defeat #r999#k of them, I will grant you permission to go forward.
That's too hard for you? Sorry, I guess this is where you stop then.
You've defeated 999 #o8200012#. That's amazing. I will grant you the permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to look back at your 5th oblivion#k.
Go on. You should be able to go up till #b#m270030500##k. But, you can't go beyond that. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a new test.
You haven't defeated #r999 #o8200012##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
